pages.text: TLS system, or Tech-experimental Laser System.$(br2)As a traditional smith, I am not so willing to add such a wierd thing. But I have a good relationship with the Kappas at the foot of the mountain. So I helped them to apply this system on a replica of the Tachi of Spirit Sakura.

When the system started, I felt it strongly ponunding me. It seems that this system is not so stable, but powerful enough.$(br2)Laser is so powerful. Maybe because laser is not a material object, this Blade becomes so sharp that it cut through steel in a slight touch.

Its name "Bunshi" means the beginning of civilization.$(br2)What is the civilization? The era that producing massive materials with great amount of electrical power? Maybe I cannot understand it now.$(br2)The name of TLS system is given by Kappas. I also cannot understand, in fact.
